chinese: n.工资，薪水
他们正在包大人那儿领每月工资。
english: They are receiving their monthly salaries from Lord Bao

chinese: n. 手掌、手心
她给我看了她手心上的花。
english: She showed me the flower in her palm

chinese: adj.生锈的
这辆生锈的|货车不能再行驶了。
english: The rusty old van was not fit to drive

chinese: 以冲，奔：匆忙做 D，冲，急速行进；（交通）繁忙时段
我得冲向食堂，不然什么吃的都没有了。
english: I'll have to rush to the canteen, otherwise there'll be nothing left

chinese: adj.普通的，平常的
我只是一个再平常不过的男人。
ady. 豆然
对大象来说，这把椅子显然太小了。
english: Apparently, this chair is too small for the elephant

chinese: adj.技术的，工艺的
由于技术的进步，现今通信更容易了。
english: Communication is much easier nowadays thanks to technological advancements

chinese: n.阻挠，障碍物
前进路上遇到阻碍就绕道而行。
english: Find another way around the obstruction in your path

chinese: Vt. 消化n摘要
很多身体部位共同参与了食物的消化过程。
english: Many parts of your body are involved in digesting food

chinese: Y. 驾车
这个男人沿着海边开着车。
english: The man is driving along the coast

chinese: adj. 强迫性的
我对图案排列有强迫症，不能忍受任何乱序。
english: I'm obsessive about pattern, I cannot bear any disorder

chinese: n. 大多数
大多数人认为这是个好主意，但我不觉得。
english: The majority thinks it's a good plan, but I don't think so

chinese: V.纠正；修复
我犯了一个错误，所以我迅速纠正了它。
english: I made a mistake, so I quickly rectified it

chinese: ad）.万能的，综合的，多才多艺的
这位多才多艺的音乐家会演奏多种乐器。
english: The versatile musician can play a wide variety of musical instruments

chinese: 几订阅；捐款；签署；同意；会费
他为自己最喜欢的杂志付了一年期的订阅费。
english: He paid for an annual subscription to his favorite magazine

chinese: adi，正统的
希腊正教的蓝顶教堂真是太美了。
english: The Greek orthodox church with blue domes is so beautiful
